capability.name: Regulatory And Legal Authority
capability.definition: Maintain effective relations with regulators, accounting and government agencies. Oversee interactions and reporting as necessary
capability.role: This service domain manages the effective relations with regulators, accounting and government agencies. It includes establishing contact, assigning relationship management responsibility, scheduling meetings and briefings as necessary and dealing with ad-hoc issues as they arise
capability.example: The bank's contact with regulators is leveraged to streamline the resolution of compliance issues to the bank's benefit

key_features.name: Identify and establish contacts
key_features.description: Enables identify and establish contacts to support maintain effective relations with regulators, accounting and government agencies

key_features.name: Assign relationship managers
key_features.description: Enables assign relationship managers to support maintain effective relations with regulators, accounting and government agencies

key_features.name: Schedule contacts and briefings
key_features.description: Enables schedule contacts and briefings to support maintain effective relations with regulators, accounting and government agencies

key_features.name: Handle issues as they arise
key_features.description: Enables handle issues as they arise to support maintain effective relations with regulators, accounting and government agencies
